vote.title: Authorize a (1) sixteen-month extension of the Master Equipment Lease/Purchase Agreement for the financing of personal property purchases with Banc of America Public Capital Corp; and (2) approving other matters in connection therewith including annual legal fees therewith - Not to exceed $30,000 - Financing: General Fund (subject to appropriations)
